STYLE_CONTAINER: #Container {background:QLinearGradient(x1:0, y1:0, x2:0, y2:1, stop:0 #20272d, stop:0.2 #5e696d); border:4px solid #4d5b5e;}
STYLE_BUTTON: QPushButton        {background-color:#1b1b1b; color:#9b9b9b;} QPushButton:checked {background-color:#252525; color:#616161;} QPushButton:hover {color:#A7DBD8;} * {font:bold normal "DejaVu Sans";}
STYLE_LINEEDIT: QLineEdit        {background-color:#252525; color:#A7DBD8; border:1px solid #252525; border-radius:1px;} QLineEdit:disabled      {color:#63645e; background-color:#3f3f3f;} QLineEdit:focus      {border:2px solid #252525;} * {font:bold normal "DejaVu Sans";}
STYLE_L_TEXTEDIT: QTextEdit      {background-color:#252525; color:#A7DBD8; border:1px solid #252525; border-radius:1px;} QTextEdit:disabled      {color:#63645e; background-color:#3f3f3f;} QTextEdit:focus      {border:2px solid #252525;} * {font:bold normal "DejaVu Sans";}
STYLE_R_TEXTEDIT: QPlainTextEdit {background-color:#252525; color:#A7DBD8; border:1px solid #252525; border-radius:1px;} QPlainTextEdit:disabled {color:#63645e; background-color:#3f3f3f;} QPlainTextEdit:focus {border:2px solid #252525;} * {font:bold normal "DejaVu Sans";}
STYLE_CHECKBOX: QCheckBox {color:#9b9b9b; margin:0px;} QCheckBox::hover {background:transparent; color:#FA6900; margin:0px;} * {font:bold normal "DejaVu Sans";}
STYLE_COMBOBOX: QComboBox {background-color:#1f1f1f; color:#9b9b9b;} QComboBox QAbstractItemView {color:#9b9b9b; background-color:#3f3f3f; selection-background-color:#3f3f3f;} * {font:normal normal "DejaVu Sans";}
